action.name: Multiattack
entries: Emerdur makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Emerdur has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: Emerdur can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Emerdur can use a bonus action to regain 15 hit points.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Emerdur adds 3 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Emerdur must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon
{@bold {@italic Purpose.}} Give the players quests and accompany them.
{@bold {@italic Trait.}} I believe I deserve more than I get, and I don't trust fully those under me. (Flaw)
{@bold {@italic Personality.}} Impatient (How should I know? Leave me alone.)
{@bold {@italic Pause.}} Scratching beard while repeating subject.
